title: PM, NA deputy speaker discuss political situation, development works
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jun 21 (APP): Deputy Speaker of the National Assembly Zahid Akram Durrani Tuesday called on Prime Minister Muhammad Shehbaz Sharif here and discussed the overall political situation in the country.
The prime minister said that the ruling coalition was striving for countryâ€™s development as well as the public welfare.
The deputy speaker thanked the prime minister for allocating the funds under Public Sector Development Program (PSDP) for development works in his constituency.
